typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string,
		SellStartDate as string,
		SellEndDate as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> salesoeder
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SalesCategory
salesoeder, SalesCategory join(ProductID == Column_1,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinmutipletables
joinmutipletables sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> destination
